column4: The system fails to bring up the network after hibernation (breezy), which package should the bug be filed against?
swsusp, maybe?  I've had similar issues, specifically with 802.11, not with wired.
I've found that modprobe -r ipw2200, modprobe ipw2200, typically brings it back.
I'm pretty sure that swsusp is the package that does this stuff.
